short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces every instance of 'praying' with 'calling my elected officials about gun control.'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension created after the Orlando massacre of 6/12/16. Rather than praying, people should actively call their elected officials and demand change.
